meanings.definition: Adjacent to or alongside a court, especially a sports court.
meanings.sent1: The courtside seats offer a close view of the game.
meanings.sent2: Fans enjoy the excitement of sitting courtside during the match.
meanings.sent3: The courtside area is like being right next to the action!
meanings.sent4: Being courtside feels like being in the heart of the game.
meanings.sent5: The courtside experience is thrilling and immersive.

meanings.definition: The area or seating located next to a court, especially a basketball court.
meanings.sent1: She cheered loudly from the courtside.
meanings.sent2: Players often interact with fans at courtside.
meanings.sent3: The courtside seats were filled with enthusiastic supporters.
meanings.sent4: The basketball players high-fived the kids at courtside.
meanings.sent5: The best view of the game is from courtside seats.
